name: Crisp Waffles
steps: ½ c. butter, melted ½ tsp. salt
Preheat waffle iron while making batter. Whip 2 eggs until frothy. Add milk and butter. Combine all dry
ingredients in a separate bowl, dry whisk to combine. Add to wet ingredients and mix just until combined,
do not overmix, will be slightly lumpy. Put approx. ¼ c. batter on hot greased waffle iron
Cook according to waffle iron directions.
